scripts.build: nest build && node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); if(fs.existsSync('src')) { try{ fs.rmSync('dist', { recursive: true, force: true }); }catch(e){}; fs.mkdirSync('dist', { recursive: true }); const copy = (src, dest) => { for(const name of fs.readdirSync(src)){ const s = path.join(src,name); const d = path.join(dest,name); const stat = fs.statSync(s); if(stat.isDirectory()){ fs.mkdirSync(d, { recursive: true }); copy(s,d); } else { try{ fs.copyFileSync(s,d); }catch(e){} } } }; copy('src','dist'); }"
scripts.test:all: npm --prefix microservices/services/user-service test && npm --prefix microservices/services/alert-service test && npm --prefix microservices/services/weather-service test && npm --prefix microservices/services/notification-service test && npm --prefix microservices/services/preference-service test && npm --prefix microservices/services/log-service test && npm --prefix microservices/gateway/api-gateway test
